name: JugglerNaut
description:
JugglerNaut is a score-based game. You have to juggle up to 3 balls to keep scoring high. You begin with a safety-net but soon you are by yourself.

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls;

. Endless score-based gameplay challenge!

.Simple FUN!
